meanings.definition: The process of converting limestone into dolomite.
meanings.sent1: The dolomitizations in the cave took many years to complete.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study dolomitizations to understand how dolomite forms.
meanings.sent3: The dolomitizations in the rock seemed like a magical transformation.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for dolomitizations turned ordinary stones into precious gems.
meanings.sent5: The dolomitizations in the soil created a beautiful marble-like pattern.

meanings.definition: The act of forming dolomite through chemical processes.
meanings.sent1: We observed the dolomitizations in the lab experiment.
meanings.sent2: The dolomitizations in the ocean occur naturally over time.
meanings.sent3: The dolomitizations in the beaker bubbled like a fizzy drink.
meanings.sent4: His words were like dolomitizations, changing the atmosphere instantly.
meanings.sent5: The dolomitizations in the volcano created stunning new rock formations.
